original_text: And thou shalt make curtains of goats' hair to be a covering upon the tabernacle: eleven curtains shalt thou make.
korean_text: 그 성막을 덮는 막 곧 휘장을 염소털로 만들되 열한 폭을 만들지며

sentences.original_text: And thou shalt make curtains of goats' hair
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 너는 염소 털로 휘장을 만들어야 한다

sentences.original_text: to be a covering upon the tabernacle:
